languages.text: "Йеремия с первой смены недавно почил. Предохранитель на троне не сработал и он, обезумев, себе зенки инструментом выколол".

traits.locale_text: "Еремия с первой смены недавно почил. Правда ли, нет — говорят, предохранитель на троне не сработал и он, от воплей спятившего астропата, себе зенки инструментом выколол".

languages.text: "Hyremiah from the first shift died the other day. The safety switch on his throne didn't engage, so he went mad and gouged his eyes out with a tool."
languages.original_text: "Йеремия с первой смены недавно почил. Предохранитель на троне не сработал и он, обезумев, себе зенки инструментом выколол".

traits.locale_text: "Jeremia from the first shift expired the other day. The safety switch on his throne didn't engage, so he went mad and gouged his eyes out with a tool."
"Jeremia from the first shift expired the other day. The safety switch on his throne didn't engage, so he went mad and gouged his eyes out with a tool."
"Jeremia from the first shift died the other day. The safety switch on his throne didn't engage, so he went mad and gouged his eyes out with a tool."
"Jeremia from the first shift died the other day. The safety switch on his throne didn't engage, so he went mad and gouged his eyes out with a tool."
"Hyremiah from the first shift died the other day. The safety switch on his throne didn't engage, so he went mad and gouged his eyes out with a tool."
"Hyremiah from the first shift died the other day. The safety switch on his throne didn't engage, so he went mad and gouged his eyes out with a tool."

languages.text: «Hyremiah, del primer turno, murió el otro día. El seguro de su trono no se conectó, así que se volvió loco y se arrancó los ojos con una herramienta».
languages.original_text: "Hyremiah from the first shift died the other day. The safety switch on his throne didn't engage, so he went mad and gouged his eyes out with a tool."

traits.locale_text: «Hyremiah, del primer turno, murió el otro día. El seguro de su trono no se conectó, así que se volvió loco y se arrancó los ojos con una herramienta».

languages.text: 「最初のシフトのハイレミアは先日亡くなりました。彼の王座の安全スイッチが作動せず、頭がおかしくなって、道具で目をえぐり出したのです」
languages.original_text: "Hyremiah from the first shift died the other day. The safety switch on his throne didn't engage, so he went mad and gouged his eyes out with a tool."

traits.locale_text: 「最初のシフトのハイレミアは先日亡くなりました。彼の王座の安全スイッチが作動せず、頭がおかしくなって、道具で目をえぐり出したのです」

languages.text: “第一班的海利米前几天死了。他的宝座上的安全开关没启动，于是他发了疯，用手里的工具把他自己的眼睛挖了出来。”
languages.original_text: "Hyremiah from the first shift died the other day. The safety switch on his throne didn't engage, so he went mad and gouged his eyes out with a tool."

traits.locale_text: “第一班的海利米前几天死了。他的宝座上的安全开关没启动，于是他发了疯，用手里的工具把他自己的眼睛挖了出来。”

languages.text: "Hyremiah von der ersten Schicht ist neulich gestorben. Der Sicherheitsschalter an seinem Thron hat nicht funktioniert, also hat er den Verstand verloren und sich mit einem Werkzeug die Augen herausgeschabt."
languages.original_text: "Hyremiah from the first shift died the other day. The safety switch on his throne didn't engage, so he went mad and gouged his eyes out with a tool."

traits.locale_text: "Hyremiah von der ersten Schicht ist neulich gestorben. Der Sicherheitsschalter an seinem Thron hat nicht funktioniert, also hat er den Verstand verloren und sich mit einem Werkzeug die Augen herausgeschabt."

languages.text: « Un membre de la première équipe appelé Hyremiah est mort, l'autre jour. La sécurité de son trône ne s'est pas enclenchée, alors il est devenu fou et il s'est servi d'un outil pour s'arracher les yeux. »
languages.original_text: "Hyremiah from the first shift died the other day. The safety switch on his throne didn't engage, so he went mad and gouged his eyes out with a tool."

traits.locale_text: « Un membre de la première équipe appelé Hyremiah est mort, l'autre jour. La sécurité de son trône ne s'est pas enclenchée, alors il est devenu fou et il s'est servi d'un outil pour s'arracher les yeux. »

languages.text: "İlk vardiyada çalışan Hyremiah geçen gün ölmüş. Tahtındaki güvenlik anahtarı devreye gitmemiş. O da aklını yitirip bir aletle gözlerini oymuş."
languages.original_text: "Hyremiah from the first shift died the other day. The safety switch on his throne didn't engage, so he went mad and gouged his eyes out with a tool."
